summary: An amnesiac youth tries to piece together his past, but what he discovers may jeopardize his future.
cast: Janet Paparazzo|Elijah Wood|Janeane Garofalo|George Gore II|Joe Perrino|Roger Rees|Oni Faida Lampley|Jeffrey Force|Christopher Mark Petrizzo|Rachael Leigh Cook|Sam Haft|John E. Mack|Matthew Cavallary|David France|Joan Levy|Adam LaVorgna|Alice Liu|Mary DeBellis|Alan Francis Sullivan
title: El olvidado mundo de Barney
